name: Shipping News "One Less Heartless to Fear"
description: Album Credits AT016/RUM044 recorded live in Louisville, Kentucky at Skull Alley on June 19th, 2009 - except for “Axons” & “Half A House” which were recorded live at the O-Nest in Tokyo, Japan on April 2nd, 2006. Artwork by Dan McCarthy. www.danmccarthy.org Letterpress CD Covers printed at Dexterity Press by Jeff Mueller. www.dexteritypress.com Shipping News is : - Jeff Mueller plays electric guitar and vocalizes on “Axons” & “Bad Eve.” - Jason Noble plays electric guitar and vocalizes on the rest except “Half A House.” He labors under the false belief that this is jazz. - Kyle Crabtree plays drums, though at times it seems the drums are playing him. - Todd Cook plays three different electric bass guitars on this recording, though only two by choice. Band website : www.facebook.com/shippingnews Labels : www.africantape.com ruminance.free.fr

name: Marvin, Electric², Pneu & Papier Tigre Double 7"
description: Double 7" Credits AT015 Originally released in September 2010, this double 7" was produced for the 'Colonie de Vacances', a unique friendly tour with Papier Tigre, Electric Electric, Marvin and Pneu. 'My Athlet' (Electric Electric) was recorded at Pine Cone Studio from June 28th 2010, 14h33 till June 29th, 3h58 / mastered by Miguel Constantino. 'Copainscabana' (Marvin) was recorded by Miguel Constantino at Penpicou on July 1st & 2nd 2010 / mixed in the same breath by Miguel Constantino and Marvin in Quimperlé / mastered by Miguel Constantino . 'No I'm Not' (Pneu) was recorded by Pneu in the rehearsal studio on June 2010 / mixed by Jey in his headphone and computer's studio / mastered by Miguel Constantino. 'Intelligent Horses' (Papier Tigre) was recorded by Miguel Constantino at Penpicou at the end of June 2010 / mixed by Miguel Constantino and Papier Tigre / mastered by Miguel Constantino. Artwork by JB Pneu
